title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: 10 best ways to redeem 100,000 Alaska Airlines Atmos Rewards points
items.description: Book business-class flights to Europe plus 9 other ways to redeem 100,000 Alaska Airlines Atmos Rewards points.

items.title: How much does a river cruise cost? Not as much as you might think
items.description: They have a reputation for being expensive vacations, but river cruises are available for budget travelers as well.

items.title: 10 cards that can replace your Amex Platinum
items.description: Are you reconsidering your Amex Platinum due to the high annual fee? Consider replacing it with one of these travel rewards credit cards.
